pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cora Data for Entity Resolution // Duplicated publication data (pre-processed and formatted) for entity resolution. This data set contains a total of 1879 records. The following variables are included in the data set: id, title, book title, authors, address, date, year, editor, journal, volume, pages, publisher, institution, type, tech, note. The data set has a respective gold data set that provides information on which records match based on id.
